page.title: 19Ecology
page.content: During the last decade the cylce of nature has been interfered with if not broken by modern agricultural practice, the use of{agro-chemicals}on a large scale & the destruction of tree cover. The skyline has changed from{wooded}to{tree-less}acres, many species have disappeared due to loss of habitat. Some river{pollution}has occurred and the frequent cutting of roadside verges has taken a toll of some wild flowers. Heavy machinery on land has caused soil{impaction.}The damage is becoming noticed & practices are changing - trees are being planted & more care taken to preserve & not destroy. A small section of dis-used railway demonstrates natures does{re- {establish}herself as this has produced 2 orchid species, many young oaks & ash,{birds}not previously nesting here have appeared.
